verses.verse: There is therefore <S%G686><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> condemnation <S%G2631><s%> to them which are in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> who walk <S%G4043><s%> not after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

For the law <S%G3551><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> has made <S%G1659><s%> me free <S%G1659><s%> from the law <S%G3551><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> and death. <S%G2288><s%>

For what <S%G3588><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> could <S%G102><s%> not do, in that it was weak <S%G770><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> sending <S%G3992><s%> his own <S%G1438><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> in the likeness <S%G3667><s%> of sinful <S%G266><s%> flesh, <S%G4561><s%> and for sin, <S%G266><s%> condemned <S%G2632><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> in the flesh: <S%G4561><s%>

That the righteousness <S%G1345><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> might be fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in us, who walk <S%G4043><s%> not after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>

For they that are after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh <S%G4561><s%> do mind <S%G5426><s%> the things of the flesh; <S%G4561><s%> but they that are after <S%G2596><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> the things of the Spirit. <S%G4151><s%>
For to be carnally <S%G4561><s%> minded <S%G5427><s%> is death; <S%G2288><s%> but to be spiritually <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> minded <S%G5427><s%> is life <S%G2222><s%> and peace. <S%G1515><s%>

Because <S%G1360><s%> the carnal <S%G4561><s%> mind <S%G5427><s%> is enmity <S%G2189><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> God: <S%G2316><s%> for it is not subject <S%G5293><s%> to the law <S%G3551><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> indeed <S%G1063><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> be.
So then <S%G1161><s%> they that are in the flesh <S%G4561><s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> please <S%G700><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

But you are not in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> but in the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> if <S%G1512><s%> so be that the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> dwell <S%G3611><s%> in you. Now <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man have <S%G2192><s%> not the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> he is none <S%G3756><s%> of his.

And if <S%G1487><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> be in you, the body <S%G4983><s%> is dead <S%G3498><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of sin; <S%G266><s%> but the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> is life <S%G2222><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of righteousness. <S%G1343><s%>

But if <S%G1437><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of him that raised <S%G1453><s%> up Jesus <S%G2424><s%> from the dead <S%G3498><s%> dwell <S%G3611><s%> in you, he that raised <S%G1453><s%> up Christ <S%G5547><s%> from the dead <S%G3498><s%> shall also <S%G2532><s%> quicken <S%G2227><s%> your <S%G5216><s%> mortal <S%G2349><s%> bodies <S%G4983><s%> by his Spirit <S%G4151><s%> that dwells <S%G1774><s%> in you.
Therefore, <S%G686><s%> <S%G3767><s%> brothers, <S%G80><s%> we are debtors, <S%G3781><s%> not to the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> to live <S%G2198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh. <S%G4561><s%>

For if <S%G1437><s%> you live <S%G2198><s%> after <S%G2596><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> you shall die: <S%G599><s%> but if <S%G1487><s%> you through the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> do mortify <S%G2289><s%> the deeds <S%G4234><s%> of the body, <S%G4983><s%> you shall live. <S%G2198><s%>
For as many <S%G3745><s%> as are led <S%G71><s%> by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> they are the sons <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For you have <S%G2192><s%> not received <S%G2983><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of bondage <S%G1397><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to fear; <S%G5401><s%> but you have received <S%G2983><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of adoption, <S%G5206><s%> whereby <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3739><s%> we cry, <S%G2896><s%> Abba, <S%G5><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>
The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> bears <S%G4828><s%> witness <S%G4828><s%> with our spirit, <S%G4151><s%> that we are the children <S%G5043><s%> of God: <S%G2316><s%>

And if <S%G1487><s%> children, <S%G5043><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> heirs; <S%G2818><s%> heirs <S%G2818><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and joint-heirs <S%G4789><s%> with Christ; <S%G5547><s%> if <S%G1512><s%> so be that we suffer <S%G4841><s%> with him, that we may be also <S%G2532><s%> glorified <S%G4888><s%> together. <S%G4888><s%>

For I reckon <S%G3049><s%> that the sufferings <S%G3804><s%> of this <S%G3588><s%> present <S%G3568><s%> time <S%G2540><s%> are not worthy <S%G514><s%> to be compared with the glory <S%G1391><s%> which shall be revealed <S%G601><s%> in us.
For the earnest <S%G603><s%> expectation <S%G603><s%> of the creature <S%G2937><s%> waits <S%G553><s%> for the manifestation <S%G602><s%> of the sons <S%G5207><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

For the creature <S%G2937><s%> was made <S%G5293><s%> subject <S%G5293><s%> to vanity, <S%G3153><s%> not willingly, <S%G1635><s%> but by reason <S%G1223><s%> of him who has subjected <S%G5293><s%> the same in hope, <S%G1680><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> the creature <S%G2937><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> shall be delivered <S%G1659><s%> from the bondage <S%G1397><s%> of corruption <S%G5356><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the glorious <S%G1391><s%> liberty <S%G1657><s%> of the children <S%G5043><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>
For we know <S%G1492><s%> that the whole <S%G3956><s%> creation <S%G2937><s%> groans <S%G4959><s%> and travails <S%G4944><s%> in pain together <S%G4944><s%> until <S%G891><s%> now. <S%G3568><s%>

And not only <S%G3440><s%> they, but ourselves also, <S%G2532><s%> which have <S%G2192><s%> the first fruits <S%G536><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> we ourselves groan <S%G4727><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> ourselves, <S%G1438><s%> waiting <S%G553><s%> for the adoption, <S%G5206><s%> to wit, the redemption <S%G629><s%> of our body. <S%G4983><s%>

For we are saved <S%G4982><s%> by hope: <S%G1680><s%> but hope <S%G1680><s%> that is seen <S%G991><s%> is not hope: <S%G1680><s%> for what a man <S%G5100><s%> sees, <S%G991><s%> why <S%G5101><s%> does he yet hope <S%G1679><s%> for?
But if <S%G1487><s%> we hope <S%G1679><s%> for that we see <S%G991><s%> not, then do we with patience <S%G5281><s%> wait <S%G553><s%> for it.

Likewise <S%G5615><s%> the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> helps <S%G4878><s%> our infirmities: <S%G769><s%> for we know <S%G1492><s%> not what <S%G5101><s%> we should pray <S%G4336><s%> for as we ought: <S%G1163><s%> but the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> makes <S%G5241><s%> intercession <S%G5241><s%> for us with groanings <S%G4726><s%> which cannot <S%G215><s%> be uttered. <S%G215><s%>

And he that searches <S%G2045><s%> the hearts <S%G2588><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is the mind <S%G5427><s%> of the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he makes <S%G1793><s%> intercession <S%G1793><s%> for the saints <S%G40><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to the will of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And we know <S%G1492><s%> that all <S%G3956><s%> things work <S%G4903><s%> together <S%G4903><s%> for good <S%G18><s%> to them that love <S%G25><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> to them who are the called <S%G2822><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to his purpose. <S%G4286><s%>

For whom <S%G3739><s%> he did foreknow, <S%G4267><s%> he also <S%G2532><s%> did predestinate <S%G4309><s%> to be conformed <S%G4832><s%> to the image <S%G1504><s%> of his Son, <S%G5207><s%> that he might be the firstborn <S%G4416><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> he did predestinate, <S%G4309><s%> them he also <S%G2532><s%> called: <S%G2564><s%> and whom <S%G3739><s%> he called, <S%G2564><s%> them he also <S%G2532><s%> justified: <S%G1344><s%> and whom <S%G3739><s%> he justified, <S%G1344><s%> them he also <S%G2532><s%> glorified. <S%G1392><s%>
What <S%G5101><s%> shall we then <S%G3767><s%> say <S%G2046><s%> to these <S%G5023><s%> things? If <S%G1487><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> be for us, who <S%G5101><s%> can be against <S%G2596><s%> us?

He that spared <S%G5339><s%> not his own <S%G2398><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> but delivered <S%G3860><s%> him up for us all, <S%G3956><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> shall he not with him also <S%G2532><s%> freely give <S%G5483><s%> us all <S%G3956><s%> things?
Who <S%G5101><s%> shall lay <S%G1458><s%> any thing to the charge <S%G1458><s%> <S%G2596><s%> of God's <S%G2316><s%> elect? <S%G1588><s%> It is God <S%G2316><s%> that justifies. <S%G1344><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> is he that comdemns? <S%G2632><s%> It is Christ <S%G5547><s%> that died, <S%G599><s%> yes <S%G1161><s%> rather, <S%G3123><s%> that is risen <S%G1453><s%> again, <S%G1453><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> is even <S%G2532><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> hand of God, <S%G2316><s%> who <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> makes <S%G1793><s%> intercession <S%G1793><s%> for us.

Who <S%G5101><s%> shall separate <S%G5562><s%> us from the love <S%G26><s%> of Christ? <S%G5547><s%> shall tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> distress, <S%G4730><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> persecution, <S%G1375><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> famine, <S%G3042><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> nakedness, <S%G1132><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> peril, <S%G2794><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> sword? <S%G3162><s%>

As it is written, <S%G1125><s%> For your sake <S%G1752><s%> we are killed <S%G2289><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> long; we are accounted <S%G3049><s%> as sheep <S%G4263><s%> for the slaughter. <S%G4967><s%>
No, <S%G235><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5125><s%> things we are more <S%G5245><s%> than <S%G5245><s%> conquerors <S%G5245><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> him that loved <S%G25><s%> us.

For I am persuaded, <S%G3982><s%> that neither <S%G3777><s%> death, <S%G2288><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> principalities, <S%G746><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> powers, <S%G1411><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> things present, <S%G1764><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> things to come, <S%G3195><s%>

Nor <S%G3777><s%> height, <S%G5313><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> depth, <S%G899><s%> nor <S%G3777><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> creature, <S%G2937><s%> shall be able <S%G1410><s%> to separate <S%G5562><s%> us from the love <S%G26><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> our Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
